error.account_not_verified: Account not verified. Please activate your account through the activation email from Crownstone.

data.usb: Set up a Crownstone USB dongle

usb_config.description:
Select the serial port of the Crownstone USB dongle.

Look for a device with VID 10c4 and PID ea60.
usb_config.title: Crownstone USB dongle configuration

usb_manual_config.description: Manually enter the path of a Crownstone USB dongle.
usb_manual_config.title: Crownstone USB dongle manual path

data.use_crownstone_usb: Use a Crownstone USB dongle for local data transmission.
